title: Doom 64
notes: Native controller support **Decky Plugin: Works out of the box**. **2.0 Standalone: Works out of the box**.
description: You killed the Demons once, they were all dead. Or so you thought... A single Demon Entity escaped detection. Systematically it altered decaying, dead carnage back into grotesque living tissue. The Demons have returned - stronger and more vicious than ever before. You mission is clear, there are no options: kill or be killed!
